short.am,ar,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Customize your Shkolo experience with ShkoloTweaks! Dark mode, Custom widgets, Cool Stats, and more!
short.bg: Персонализирайте своето Shkolo със ShkoloTweaks! Тъмен режим, персонализирани джаджи, любопитни статистики и много други!
short.es: ¡Personaliza tu experiencia en Shkolo con ShkoloTweaks! Modo oscuro, widgets personalizados, estadísticas interesantes y más!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of the white background? Just enable dark mode!
See cool stats, enable widgets, and try new things.
